translation.en: She rode a motor cycle.
He held the board, while she hammered it in.
There might be terrible peril.
After lighting a candle they could see around themselves.
They made their strategy.
She didn't know where to look.
They were starting to recover.
The talks for creating a climate agreement were ongoing today.
His determination was obvious as he kept trying.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: Instruction hadn't been given.
They waited for the presentation to commence.
translation.tam: Kira at court, the court filled.

translation.en: The switch was faulty, and did not work.
The condition they found themselves in was unambiguous.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: Eventually they were able to get the idea behind it.
They announced that the information was correct.
They dined.
The test would be difficult.
He supported her.
She reveled in it.

He didn't heed her instructions.
It was time to let go, so she disembarked.
She wasn't making any headway on the problem.
She offered their hospitality.
translation.tam: Chatha and Terubim, the fire warm.

translation.en: They wouldn't stop requesting it.
She forbid him to continue on this path.
Doing the job was difficult, but it needed to be done.
The fatigue was showing.
They wanted to snooze.
The child hurt from their fall.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: She charged her quarry.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: Her outing was exhausting.
The bike had a flat tire.
He told his friend that he didn't want the book right now.

It brightened their day.
He hadn't wanted to be taught.
Salutations.
They had a fresh opportunity.
Their tactics entrapped their quarry.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: She was making headway on the problem.
The telephone had a wiretap.
Regardless of their action, the wound still hurt.
They didn't know what their next move would be.
He was very busy.
The key refused to unlock the door.
The door was unlocked.

He couldn't appreciate what they were trying to say.
The child couldn't have predicted this unforeseen circumstance.
